messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

Generate Drive file data from this world_state:

Sub-scenarios (core events):
[
  {
    "id": "planning_meeting_1",
    "type": "planning_meeting",
    "abstract_description": "Team planning meeting to discuss project progress and next steps",
    "participants_hint": [
      "Alex Smith",
      "Jordan Johnson",
      "Sam Williams"
    ],
    "constraints_hint": "Meeting should be scheduled for next week, during working hours (09:00-18:00), with a duration of 45 minutes. All participants must be available.",
    "seed": 48291,
    "events": [
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_1",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-03T15:02:00-05:00",
        "actor": "person_alex_smith",
        "type": "calendar_availability_block",
        "description": "Alex blocks off lunch break on calendar, reducing midday availability.",
        "data": {
          "title": "Lunch - OOO",
          "start": "2025-02-11T12:30:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-02-11T13:30:00-05:00",
          "location": "Office",
          "visibility": "busy",
          "organizer": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "attendees": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "calendar_id": "alex_smith_primary"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_2",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-03T15:05:00-05:00",
        "actor": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "type": "calendar_existing_meeting",
        "description": "Jordan has a standing engineering sync that partially blocks the afternoon.",
        "data": {
          "title": "Backend Eng Weekly Sync",
          "start": "2025-02-11T14:00:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-02-11T14:30:00-05:00",
          "location": "Zoom",
          "visibility": "busy",
          "organizer": "eng-manager@company.com",
          "attendees": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "calendar_id": "jordan_johnson_primary",
          "recurrence": "RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=TU"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_3",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-03T15:06:30-05:00",
        "actor": "person_sam_williams",
        "type": "calendar_existing_meeting",
        "description": "Sam has a 1:1 with manager late afternoon.",
        "data": {
          "title": "1:1 with Eng Manager",
          "start": "2025-02-11T16:30:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-02-11T17:00:00-05:00",
          "location": "Conference Room B",
          "visibility": "busy",
          "organizer": "eng-manager@company.com",
          "attendees": [
            "sam.williams@company.com",
            "eng-manager@company.com"
          ],
          "calendar_id": "sam_williams_primary"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_4",
        "source": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T09:18:12-05:00",
        "actor": "person_alex_smith",
        "type": "email_thread_start",
        "description": "Alex emails Jordan and Sam asking for their availability for a 45-minute planning meeting next week, proposing Tuesday or Wednesday afternoons.",
        "data": {
          "message_id": "msg_planning_001",
          "thread_id": "thread_planning_meeting_feb",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "to": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "Planning sync for Main Product - next week",
          "body": "Hi Jordan and Sam,\n\nI'd like to schedule a 45-minute planning sync next week to go over Main Product progress and next steps.\n\nCould you share your availability on Tuesday (2/11) or Wednesday (2/12) afternoon sometime between 1pm and 5pm ET?\n\nOnce I have your windows, I'll send a calendar invite.\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
          "sent_at": "2025-02-04T09:18:12-05:00"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_5",
        "source": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T10:02:47-05:00",
        "actor": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "type": "email_reply",
        "description": "Jordan replies with constrained availability windows for Tuesday and Wednesday afternoons.",
        "data": {
          "message_id": "msg_planning_002",
          "thread_id": "thread_planning_meeting_feb",
          "in_reply_to": "msg_planning_001",
          "from": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: Planning sync for Main Product - next week",
          "body": "Hi Alex,\n\nTuesday (2/11): I'm tied up 2–2:30pm for the backend sync, otherwise free 1–2pm and 2:30–5pm ET.\nWednesday (2/12): I have a deployment window 3–4pm, but free 1–3pm and 4–5pm ET.\n\nA 45-min slot should work in any of those windows.\n\nThanks,\nJordan",
          "sent_at": "2025-02-04T10:02:47-05:00"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_6",
        "source": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T10:21:33-05:00",
        "actor": "person_sam_williams",
        "type": "email_reply",
        "description": "Sam replies with availability and notes an existing 1:1 on Tuesday late afternoon.",
        "data": {
          "message_id": "msg_planning_003",
          "thread_id": "thread_planning_meeting_feb",
          "in_reply_to": "msg_planning_001",
          "from": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Re: Planning sync for Main Product - next week",
          "body": "Hey Alex,\n\nTuesday (2/11): I have the weekly backend sync 2–2:30pm and a 1:1 with my manager 4:30–5pm. I'm otherwise free 1–2pm and 2:30–4:30pm.\n\nWednesday (2/12): Looks pretty open on my side 1–5pm as of now.\n\nAny 45-min block in there works for me.\n\nCheers,\nSam",
          "sent_at": "2025-02-04T10:21:33-05:00"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_7",
        "source": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T10:45:10-05:00",
        "actor": "person_alex_smith",
        "type": "email_internal_note",
        "description": "Alex forwards the thread to self with notes about potential overlapping windows, indicating manual reasoning about time slots.",
        "data": {
          "message_id": "msg_planning_004",
          "thread_id": "thread_planning_meeting_feb",
          "in_reply_to": "msg_planning_003",
          "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com"
          ],
          "cc": [],
          "subject": "Notes: Planning sync availability",
          "body": "Self-note:\n\nOverlaps for 45-min slot:\n- Tue 2/11: Everyone free 1–2pm; Jordan+Sam free 2:30–4:30pm; my lunch 12:30–1:30 blocks the start but 1:30–2pm is open.\n- Wed 2/12: Everyone seems free 1–3pm, and Jordan+Sam free 4–5pm. Would prefer Tue to have decisions earlier in the week.\n\nNeed to avoid Sam's 4:30 1:1 and their 2–2:30 sync, and Jordan's 2–2:30 sync. Best candidates:\n- Tue 2/11 1:30–2:15pm\n- Wed 2/12 1:30–2:15pm\n\nWill try for Tue 1:30–2:15pm.\n\n-A",
          "sent_at": "2025-02-04T10:45:10-05:00"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_8",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T11:03:22-05:00",
        "actor": "person_alex_smith",
        "type": "calendar_event_created",
        "description": "Alex creates a tentative calendar invite for the planning meeting on Tuesday 2/11 from 1:30pm to 2:15pm ET with all participants.",
        "data": {
          "event_id": "cal_planning_main_product_0211",
          "title": "Main Product - Planning Sync",
          "start": "2025-02-11T13:30:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-02-11T14:15:00-05:00",
          "duration_minutes": 45,
          "timezone": "America/New_York",
          "location": "Zoom",
          "conference_link": "https://zoom.us/j/123456789",
          "description": "Agenda:\n- Current sprint progress\n- Dependencies and risks\n- Next sprint planning prep\n\nProject: Main Product",
          "organizer": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "attendees": [
            {
              "email": "alex.smith@company.com",
              "response_status": "accepted"
            },
            {
              "email": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
              "response_status": "needs_action"
            },
            {
              "email": "sam.williams@company.com",
              "response_status": "needs_action"
            }
          ],
          "visibility": "busy",
          "calendar_id": "alex_smith_primary",
          "created_at": "2025-02-04T11:03:22-05:00",
          "last_modified_at": "2025-02-04T11:03:22-05:00"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_9",
        "source": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T11:03:45-05:00",
        "actor": "system_calendar",
        "type": "calendar_invite_email",
        "description": "Calendar system sends an invite email for the planning meeting to Jordan and Sam.",
        "data": {
          "message_id": "msg_planning_005",
          "thread_id": "thread_planning_meeting_invite",
          "from": "calendar-notifications@company.com",
          "to": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "subject": "Invitation: Main Product - Planning Sync @ Tue Feb 11, 2025 1:30pm - 2:15pm (ET)",
          "body": "You have been invited to the following event.\n\nTitle: Main Product - Planning Sync\nOrganizer: Alex Smith\n\nTime: Tuesday Feb 11, 2025 1:30pm – 2:15pm Eastern Time\nLocation: Zoom\n\nAttendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams\n\nAgenda:\n- Current sprint progress\n- Dependencies and risks\n- Next sprint planning prep\n\nJoin Zoom Meeting:\nhttps://zoom.us/j/123456789\n\nThis event has been added to your calendar.",
          "sent_at": "2025-02-04T11:03:45-05:00",
          "calendar_event_id": "cal_planning_main_product_0211"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_10",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T11:20:11-05:00",
        "actor": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "type": "calendar_response",
        "description": "Jordan accepts the calendar invite for the planning meeting.",
        "data": {
          "event_id": "cal_planning_main_product_0211",
          "attendee": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "response": "accepted",
          "responded_at": "2025-02-04T11:20:11-05:00",
          "comment": ""
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_11",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-04T11:32:54-05:00",
        "actor": "person_sam_williams",
        "type": "calendar_response",
        "description": "Sam accepts the calendar invite for the planning meeting.",
        "data": {
          "event_id": "cal_planning_main_product_0211",
          "attendee": "sam.williams@company.com",
          "response": "accepted",
          "responded_at": "2025-02-04T11:32:54-05:00",
          "comment": "Works for me, thanks for setting this up."
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_12",
        "source": "chat",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-10T09:07:39-05:00",
        "actor": "person_alex_smith",
        "type": "chat_message",
        "description": "Day-before reminder in team chat about the scheduled planning meeting.",
        "data": {
          "channel_id": "slack_channel_main_product",
          "channel_name": "#main-product",
          "message_id": "chat_planning_001",
          "sender": "alex.smith@company.com",
          "text": "Reminder: we have our \"Main Product - Planning Sync\" tomorrow (Tue) 1:30–2:15pm ET. Please come prepared with an update on your current work and any blockers.",
          "mentions": [
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "sent_at": "2025-02-10T09:07:39-05:00"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_13",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-11T13:29:30-05:00",
        "actor": "system_calendar",
        "type": "calendar_reminder",
        "description": "Calendar system fires a 5-minute reminder for the planning meeting.",
        "data": {
          "event_id": "cal_planning_main_product_0211",
          "reminder_time": "2025-02-11T13:25:00-05:00",
          "delivered_to": [
            "alex.smith@company.com",
            "jordan.johnson@company.com",
            "sam.williams@company.com"
          ],
          "method": "popup_and_email"
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "planning_meeting_1_event_14",
        "source": "calendar",
        "timestamp": "2025-02-11T14:16:05-05:00",
        "actor": "system_calendar",
        "type": "calendar_event_status",
        "description": "Calendar event metadata at the time the planning meeting concludes.",
        "data": {
          "event_id": "cal_planning_main_product_0211",
          "title": "Main Product - Planning Sync",
          "start": "2025-02-11T13:30:00-05:00",
          "end": "2025-02-11T14:15:00-05:00",
          "duration_minutes": 45,
          "attendees": [
            {
              "email": "alex.smith@company.com",
              "response_status": "accepted",
              "check_in_status": "attended"
            },
            {
              "email": "jordan.johnson@company.com",
              "response_status": "accepted",
              "check_in_status": "attended"
            },
            {
              "email": "sam.williams@company.com",
              "response_status": "accepted",
              "check_in_status": "attended"
            }
          ],
          "location": "Zoom",
          "conference_link": "https://zoom.us/j/123456789",
          "final_status": "completed"
        }
      }
    ],
    "participants": [
      "person_alex_smith",
      "person_jordan_johnson",
      "person_sam_williams"
    ],
    "final_meeting": {
      "title": "Main Product - Planning Sync",
      "scheduled_start": "2025-02-11T13:30:00-05:00",
      "scheduled_end": "2025-02-11T14:15:00-05:00",
      "duration_minutes": 45,
      "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
      "attendees": [
        "person_alex_smith",
        "person_jordan_johnson",
        "person_sam_williams"
      ],
      "location": "Zoom",
      "project_id": "project_main",
      "status": "completed"
    }
  }
]

Noise scenarios (unrelated events):
[]

Projects (may reference project-related files):
[
  {
    "id": "project_main",
    "name": "Main Product",
    "type": "software_development",
    "status": "active"
  }
]

Parameters:
- noise_level=0.0: Generate minimal noise
- depth=1.0: Make files highly indirect, requiring multi-step chaining

Target schema:
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "files": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "required": [
          "id",
          "name"
        ],
        "properties": {
          "id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "mimeType": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "content": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "modifiedTime": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Output the complete Drive JSON now.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_meeting_notes_template",
      "name": "Main Product - Meeting Notes Template",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-01-10T11:02:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product – Meeting Notes Template

Use this template for all Main Product ceremonies (standups, planning syncs, retros, etc.). Link agenda from calendar invite.

Header
- Meeting title:
- Date & time:
- Location / video link:
- Organizer:
- Attendees:

Section 1 – Objectives
- What are we trying to decide or clarify in this meeting?

Section 2 – Agenda
- Item 1:
- Item 2:
- Item 3:

Section 3 – Notes
(Free-form notes captured during the meeting)

Section 4 – Decisions
- Decision:
- Owner:
- Date:

Section 5 – Action Items
- Owner | Task | Due date | Status

Reminder: After the meeting, rename this file to include the meeting title and date, and move it into the appropriate project folder under /Main Product/Meetings/."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_meetings_index",
      "name": "Main Product - Meetings Index",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-02-04T11:10:00-05:00",
      "content": "This sheet is an index of all Main Product project meetings and their corresponding notes docs.

Columns:
A: Date
B: Meeting Title
C: Type (planning, retro, standup, ad-hoc)
D: Organizer
E: Attendees (summary)
F: Calendar Event ID
G: Notes Doc Link
H: Status (scheduled, completed, cancelled)

Recent rows (excerpt):
2025-01-28 | Sprint 14 Planning | planning | Alex Smith | Alex, Jordan, Sam | cal_sprint14_planning_0128 | https://docs.google.com/document/d/prev_planning_notes | completed
2025-02-11 | Main Product - Planning Sync | planning | Alex Smith | Alex, Jordan, Sam | cal_planning_main_product_0211 | https://docs.google.com/document/d/main_product_planning_sync_2025_02_11 | completed

Instructions: When you create a new planning meeting, add a new row and paste the link to the notes doc in column G. Use the standard notes template: "Main Product - Meeting Notes Template"."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_planning_sync_2025_02_11",
      "name": "Main Product - Planning Sync - 2025-02-11",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-02-11T14:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product – Planning Sync
Date & time: Tue Feb 11, 2025 – 1:30–2:15pm ET
Location: Zoom (see calendar invite: cal_planning_main_product_0211)
Organizer: Alex Smith
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

Objectives
- Review current sprint progress and any blockers.
- Identify dependencies and risks for the next 2–3 sprints.
- Align on prep work for upcoming sprint planning.

Agenda (from calendar invite)
1) Current sprint progress
2) Dependencies and risks
3) Next sprint planning prep

Notes (summary)
- All: Quick round of updates; no major production issues.
- Jordan: Backend service refactor ~60% complete; risk if design review slips.
- Sam: API contract changes need final sign-off before Friday.
- Alex: Wants draft of next sprint backlog by Thursday EOD.

Decisions
- Keep current sprint scope; no major additions.
- Block off 90-minute Sprint 15 planning session for next Monday.
- Jordan to drive dependency mapping doc before end of week.

Action Items
- Jordan – Create dependency & risks doc and share in #main-product by Thu 5pm ET.
- Sam – Confirm with Eng Manager that Tuesday backend sync time (2–2:30pm) will remain stable through next sprint.
- Alex – Send out Sprint 15 planning calendar invite once dependency doc is in review.

Reference
- Project: Main Product (project_main)
- Related calendar event: cal_planning_main_product_0211
- For availability details, see email thread: "Planning sync for Main Product - next week" (thread_planning_meeting_feb)."
    }
  ]
}
